name: Debian
postCreateCommand: echo 'deb http://deb.debian.org/debian trixie main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/trixie.list > /dev/null && echo 'Package: *\nPin: release n=trixie\nPin-Priority: 100' | sudo tee /etc/apt/preferences.d/trixie > /dev/null && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y -t trixie valac meson ninja-build libgtk-4-dev libadwaita-1-dev libgee-0.8-dev libgranite-7-dev libjson-glib-dev libecal2.0-dev libsoup-3.0-dev libwebkitgtk-6.0-dev libgtksourceview-5-dev libportal-dev libportal-gtk4-dev
